content: The year 2020 has started on a very challenging note for all of us. The world woke up to a new infection, COVID-19 caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus. The virus was so named as it is almost similar to the SARS virus and like it, is an RNA virus belonging to the f… [+3313 chars]
